brands.title: Distributed Brands

about.title: About Our Company
about.description: LYVIO MARINE, a family business in Antibes since 1949, specializes in marine electricity. Just 1 minute from the Vauban port, it offers spare parts, repairs, and online orders with international delivery.
about.address: Find us at 4 Avenue Frédéric Mistral, 06600 Antibes.

questions.question: What services does Lyvio offer?
questions.answer:
Lyvio specializes in navigation systems and marine electricity. We offer:

Installation of marine electrical systems: Setting up navigation, communication, and power systems aboard vessels.
Maintenance and repair: Regular maintenance and repairs to ensure the proper functioning of your electrical and navigation systems.
Consultation and optimization: Tailored consultations to optimize the efficiency of your maritime systems, according to your specific needs.

questions.question: What types of vessels does Lyvio work on?
questions.answer: We work on a wide range of vessels, including yachts, fishing boats, commercial ships, and leisure boats. Our experts are qualified to handle various equipment, adapting to the specifics of each type of vessel.

questions.question: What is your service area?
questions.answer: Lyvio mainly operates in the Provence-Alpes-Côte d’Azur region. We can also travel internationally for specific projects. Contact us to discuss interventions outside our usual area.

questions.question: Do you offer an emergency service for breakdowns?
questions.answer: Yes, Lyvio provides a 24/7 emergency service for electrical breakdowns and critical navigation issues. If needed, you can contact us quickly, and we will send a team to resolve the issue as soon as possible.

questions.question: How can I get a personalized quote from Lyvio?
questions.answer: To get a quote, you can contact us through the contact form on our website, by phone, or by email. We will ask you a few questions about your project to understand your needs and provide a detailed quote within 48 hours.

questions.question: How can I track the progress of my project?
questions.answer: We provide regular and detailed reports on the progress of the work. You can also contact your project manager directly for any additional questions or updates.

questions.question: How can I contact Lyvio?
questions.answer: You can reach us by phone at +33 (4) 93 34 18 89 or +33 (6) 29 69 58 65, by email at contact@lyviomarine.fr, or through the contact form on our website. We are available to answer your questions, discuss your projects, or arrange a consultation.
